title.rendered: Women in Motion Film Festival Accra

content.rendered:
We are teaming up with Alliance Française d’Accra and Goethe-Institut Ghana to bring you eight nights of films for, about, and by women from March  8 – 17, 2023. This film festival is part of activities marking Women’s History Month. All screenings are free.

Find the full program line-up and other information here: https://bit.ly/WIMAccra
